message.content:
I need to identify the difference between revenue and cost from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement:
- Total Revenue: 851679.79
- Total Cost: 543370.00

The difference between revenue and cost represents the Gross Profit, which is 851679.79 - 543370.00 = 308309.79

I can also verify this by looking directly at the Gross Profit line item in the statement, which shows 308309.79, confirming my calculation.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '308309.79'}}
```
